Missouri_City.KUHT: KUHT, virtual and VHF digital channel 8, is a Public Broadcasting Service (PBS) member television station licensed to Houston, Texas. It is notable as the first public television station in the United States. The station is owned by the University of Houston System and operated by Houston Public Media, which also operates sister radio station KUHF (88.7 FM), a National Public Radio (NPR) member station.
